effect.sun_moon: User switches position on the field with the friendly Pokémon opposite it. If the user is in the middle position in a triple battle, or there are no other friendly Pokémon, this move will fail.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: User switches position on the field with the friendly Pokémon opposite it. If the user is in the middle position in a triple battle, or there are no other friendly Pokémon, this move will fail.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: User switches position on the field with the friendly Pokémon opposite it. If the user is in the middle position in a triple battle, or there are no other friendly Pokémon, this move will fail.

short_effect.sun_moon: User switches places with the friendly Pokémon opposite it.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: User switches places with the friendly Pokémon opposite it.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: User switches places with the friendly Pokémon opposite it.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user teleports using a strange power and switches places with one of its allies.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user teleports using a strange power and switches places with one of its allies.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user teleports using a strange power and switches places with one of its allies.
